I knew about the device because I have enhanced scanners which picked 
it up. I knew it was meant for someone and maybe I could re-program 
the person to serve me. I don't know that it's for Darkmouse. I said 
that before but than after someone mentioned it I apoligized for 
moding and said I was after the device and didn't know it was for 
Darkmouse. And hey, if you're going to yell at me, why not yell at 
the people who are attacking my cave. How did they know about my 
driver?
